channel.title: Think about it
channel.description:
Not a rant, but hear me out
Think about this, or tell someone. Next time you or them says "My life sucks" or "Fuck my life". You think you had it bad? Put yourself in the position of the man who dropped the atomic bomb on hiroshima, how would you feel knowing you were responsible for millions of children and women dead, by your hand. Now think about the person who gave birth to there young baby, 9 months of pain and torture, and what happens? The baby comes out with a disease and the doctors say he will not make it a week. What about the homeless and deaf kid with cancer? Imagine your the one, who has to kill those innocent cute dogs, because noone claimed them as there own. Imagine your that dog, cold and helpess, left to die. Now picture you as an innocent person, walking to there house, only about 50 feet away, and a drunk driver swerves into you and hits you into a coma. You wake up and your paralyzed, and suffer short term memory loss. Now think about that next time you here someone say "Fuck my life" or "My life sucks" Think about the homeless child with cancer, being hit by a drunk driver, think about the man who dropped the bomb. And you say your life sucks Get Over It

It
[/quote]

item.title: Think about it
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

I know, I was wrong. I didn’t really know the difference tbh, but I agree with mopman. I wasn’t an attention whore though, and I find that a moronic comment to make when you don’t know anything about my life (spel+unhandled).

item.title: Think about it
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

xx matty xx:

It didn’t happen overnight, I’m talking about a general improvement over like 6 months of forcing myself not to talk to people about my problems. At least I actually admit that I used to be a whining faggot, unlike you guys who will pretend you’ve been big strong men since the day you were born.

You claim to have been depressed. The symptoms you describe only fit sadness, not depression.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:35, topic:345051”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=441427.msg3247023#msg3247023 date=1277460087]
Depression is an actual disease, it doesn’t heal just because you realize people don’t like you.
[/quote]To clarify: emos aren’t depressed, they are stupid attention whores.[/quote]

Yea I know. My post was directed at xx matty xx, who said he was depressed and magically healed because nobody liked him. Which obviously means that he wasn’t depressed, just seeking attention.

item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Mopman:

That’s not depression. That’s being sad an attention whore.

If you can suddenly stop being “sad” just by realizing that people aren’t going to give you any attention by being a whiny bitch, I find it hard to believe you ever had any real issues.

item.title: Think about it
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Archer, post:28, topic:345051”]Lol if you ever get depressed and you just keep it to yourself like you tell everyone else to do, it will build up and you will commit suicide once it gets bad enough because you do not reach out for help. Unless you are a hypocrite and when you feel down you tell everyone about whats wrong with your life but believe it isn’t okay for others to do the same.

PS: I love how that was you’re first post on this forum, so fucking random lol.[/quote]I have to disagree with that (in my experience). I used to be an emo faggot and get really depressed and continuously whine to people, and it made me more and more depressed. Since I realised that people don’t actually give a shit how I feel and I stopped whining, the depression started to go.

Read full topic

item.title: Think about it
item.dc:creator: @_Kyle ~Kyle
item.description:
@_Kyle wrote:

[quote=“repacsenur, post:22, topic:345051”]bums dont have it hard tbh i was a bum for a week it’s not as bad as you picture it… you have fresh air everyday instead of sitting in doors+you can bath/shinnydip at your local beach another plus, Still i wouldn’t eat from the trash, they have public parks that give out free lunches at 12 am. If you miss that you can always go to your local jewish center for a hot meal if you don’t have those near you.

There is shelters but that still risky to eat… because bums take their dirty hands and scoop from the main soup cauldron using the scooper but you are never sure if some bum put that scooper in his mouth to do a taste then again some bums could be mentally handicapped and instead of using scooper they just use their hand or did bobbing lol.

Also you pick up some good places time from time like hospital = free food you just go there and theres a fridge full of egg/tuna salads sealed little milk/juice carts/cereals. All kinds of stuff.

But yah those disabled ppl got it worse then us, and I mean if you were born like that.

But I laugh at those ppl who turned disabled from their own misdoings they tempt fate by doing stupid stunts or want to have fun without first overlooking all angles then break their legs etc… now they are in depression and want people to feel bad for them? lol i’d laugh at those ppl and say yah you deserved it what more should be said?

Killing cute dogs? uhh it’s just a animal deal with it you’ll realize that when you mature a little. People eat cows/chickens/cats and dogs too yet you have to feel bad for dogs?

At first time i seen a raw heart of a cow i think it looked huge like a human heart was shocking etc but you lose it turns to normal to you, you know what i mean… think those ppl who kill animals care? first time maybe then its just a job.

You kill roaches/ants you don’t give a shit? of course not but if you look at them threw a microscope you’ll see they are very advanced same as dogs but you don’t care… some emotions are worth losing because they make you weak and a pussy for pretty much all the wrong reasons.

God doens’t care if you kill dogs/cats/animals because guess what animals kill other animals yet humans can’t? i’ve seen cats kill live baby birds by biting on the neck. Yet you go like aww such a cute cat? rofl.

Yah i trolled bored like hell but i said all truths pretty much spoke my mind.[/quote]
No, just no.

Read full topic
